issues.title: Critical Recipe Conflict: burner-inserter
issues.description: Essential recipe 'burner-inserter' modified by multiple mods with potentially incompatible ingredients. Problematic ingredients: iron-plate, kr-steel-gear-wheel
issues.root_cause: Multiple mods modify the burner-inserter recipe, potentially making it uncraftable on certain planets
suggested_fixes: Create conditional recipe based on available items
Add alternative recipes for different planets
Use compatibility patch to resolve ingredient conflicts

patches.description: Conditional recipe modification for burner-inserter to resolve mod conflicts
